name: Cybered Out
description:
Cybered out is a game I started in the fall of 2019 after I played the TTRPG Cyberpunk 2020 earlier that year. It originally took place after a mission my players had and covered an NPC's point of view. I stopped working on it because I got busy with college and then covid happened, but I came back to it and finished it today!

I hope you enjoy it and don't forget to leave a review of what you think!
